snippet.title: Thea: The Awakening - Return of the Giants DLC trailer
snippet.description:
On April 15th the Giants will return to Thea in our first DLC. 

Find out the new perils of the awakened Thea when you follow our brand new and giant quest-line!
Enjoy over 50 new side events plunging you into the the Slavic lore and Thea's own unique world.
Test your strength against the rising foes.
Listen to the fully voiced over events throughout the game.
Enjoy four more languages, including French, German, Polish and Russian.

Return to Thea and test your true might!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/378720
